data.meta_description: Lindsay is a cartoonist, illustrator and filmmaker based in London. His work for PositiveNegatives includes ‘A Perilous Journey’, ‘Almaz’, ‘Enrique’s Shadow’, ‘Living on the Margins’, ‘Meet the Somalis’, ‘Migrants on the Margins’ and ‘Safer From Harm’. Lindsay is currently working on a graphic novel with our Founder and Executive Director, Ben about the civil war … Continue reading Lindsay Pollock
data.text: Lindsay is a cartoonist, illustrator and filmmaker based in London. His work for PositiveNegatives includes ‘A Perilous Journey’, ‘Almaz’, ‘Enrique’s Shadow’, ‘Living on the Margins’, ‘Meet the Somalis’, ‘Migrants on the Margins’ and ‘Safer From Harm’. Lindsay is currently working on a graphic novel with our Founder and Executive Director, Ben about the civil war in Sri Lanka.
